title: Screen Tearing - Settings?
body:
Since I upgraded computers I have had screen tearing issues. If I cap the in-game FPS it will stop but I lose out on the action. I just bought a 144hz G-Sync monitor to go with my GTX 1070. I am having the same issue, I cannot leave it uncapped, I need to cap it to the refresh rate of the screen and still get some tearing. I have the latest drivers for everything and have tried many settings in league. Here is a video: https://youtu.be/EocInvTOdgY

Thanks

replies.body: When using a new piece of hardware or graphics card, it's important to make sure all drivers are up to date.  In addition to that, I suggest going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for those steps as well as list of troubleshooting steps.  Hope that helps, and grats on your new card!

Thanks, I have followed all those steps. Because my FPS is ~600 i have to cap it at 144hz so that it doesn't tear. I enabled 4x dynamic resolution to lower the fps, but still have to cap it at 144 so there are no issues. Any other ideas?

I'd recommend hitting us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look at this.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain a set of logs, and attach it in your ticket for context.  We'll respond asap!
